article.title: Status and history for [kri]
article.para: See the Github repository for issues and changes in 2023 and after.

history.history-entry: replaced all occurrences of U+0267 LATIN SMALL LETTER HENG WITH HOOK with U+014B LATIN SMALL LETTER ENG. Thanks to Steve White for noticing the problem.
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source, complete XML contributed by Adobe Systems.
